definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: That iron carried with it a slew of iron-loving metals, including gold and platinum.
sentences.chinese: 铁下沉的同时也带走了大量亲铁金属，包括金和铂。

sentences.english: DDP will be administered and patient caregivers, as appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 医将接受铂治疗患者患者照者适候讨论容。

sentences.english: The welding and welded joint marking method of U type pipe in furnace for platinum reforming was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了铂重整加热炉U型炉管的焊接与焊缝标注方法。

sentences.english: Patients also might receive a taxane instead of oxaliplatin.
sentences.chinese: 患者也有可能接受紫杉醇而非奥沙利铂治疗。

sentences.english: Cisplatin Injection is a sterile solution of Cisplatin.
sentences.chinese: 顺铂注射液是顺铂的灭菌水溶液。

sentences.english: Thee-mail being passed is either empty, too big or incorrect.
sentences.chinese: 在铂电极上，健那绿发生四步单电子传递过程。

sentences.english: Conclusion Gemcitabine-oxaliplatin combination therapy is a promising one for treating advanced hepatocellular carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 结论吉西他宾联合草酸铂化疗方案效果较好。

sentences.english: DIAB has manufacturing facilities on four continents and three research and development centers.
sentences.chinese: 戴铂在四大洲都有生产厂并在全球拥有三个研发中心。

sentences.english: Oxaliplatin is a new anticancer drug that has good inhibitive effect on cancers.
sentences.chinese: 奥沙利铂是一种新型的抗肿瘤药物，对多种癌种有效。

sentences.english: Conclusions The results indicated that carboplatin combined chemotherapy could induce disturbances of renal function.
sentences.chinese: 结论应用卡铂联合化疗，可引起肾功能障碍。

sentences.english: All the patients were treated with platinum-based chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 所有患者均经以铂类为基础的化疗方案治疗。

sentences.english: Platinum and palladium are used mostly to make pollution- control devices for cars and trucks.
sentences.chinese: 铂和钯主要用于制造轿车和卡车上的污染控制设备。

sentences.english: The addition of oxaliplatin did not improve preliminary outcomes but added significant toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 加用奥沙利铂不能改善初步结果，反而增加了毒性。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the influence on the nephrotoxicity of cisplatin at different injection time.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察不同给药时间对顺铂肾毒性的影响。

sentences.english: A platinum film resistance temperature probe has been designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种铂薄膜热电阻温度探针。

sentences.english: The cancer had not progressed after four cycles of platinum-based chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 在四周期的基于铂的化疗中，癌症病情没有进展。
